title: Client constantly repairing
body: Every time I open client it tells me that a problem has been detected with the client and it tries to repair for a long time. Upon finishing it says I cannot start the game and I need to restart the client, but then it tries to repair again when I do that. I have also used the hextech repair tool and it had not solved the problem.

replies.body: When you used the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) did you make sure you right-clicked and ran it as admin, as well as checking both options **Reinstall and Clean Uninstall**? If not, make sure you do that again following those steps, and if that still doesn't help hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to look through the logs the HRT created to see what else might be going wrong.
